title: I Will Not Let Thee Go
author: Mary A. Kidder

verses.text: I will not let thee go, I will not let thee go, Un - less thou bless me; Un - less thou bless me, I will not let thee go.
I can - not live with - out thee; I can - not live with - out thee; O bless me ere I go, O bless me ere I go.
In vain I have not wres - tled, In vain I have not wres - tled; I will not let thee go, I will not let thee go.
My strength is well - nigh spen - ded, My strength is well - nigh spen - ded; But I will not let thee go, But I will not let thee go.
